list.title: Activity
list.description: Renders a bar chart for the activity data.

list.title: Analytics
list.description: Renders an analytics component.

list.title: AppHeader
list.description: Component that renders the header of the application when the user is logged in.

list.title: AppHeaderMob
list.description: Component that renders the application header for mobile devices.

list.title: AppLayout
list.description: Component that renders the layout of the application.

list.title: AppSidebar
list.description: Component that renders the sidebar of the application.

list.title: Dashboard
list.description: Component that renders the dashboard for the application.

list.title: DataConsumer
list.description: Component that consumes data provided by the DataProvider component.

list.title: DataProvider
list.description: Component that provides data to its children via a context API.

list.title: Error
list.description: Component that renders the error page for the application.

list.title: ErrorMessage
list.description: Component that renders an error message.

list.title: Hero
list.description: Renders a hero section.

list.title: Loader
list.description: Component that renders a loader.

list.title: Login
list.description: Component that renders the login page for the application.

list.title: MainFooter
list.description: Component that renders the main footer of the application.

list.title: MainHeader
list.description: Component that renders the main header of the application.

list.title: MainLayout
list.description: Component that renders the main layout of the application.

list.title: Nutrient
list.description: Renders a nutrient component.

list.title: Performance
list.description: Component displaying a radar chart for performance.

list.title: Router
list.description: Component that handles routing in the application using React Router.

list.title: Score
list.description: Component that displays a circular score chart.

list.title: Sessions
list.description: Component that renders a line chart for the average duration of sessions.

list.title: extractActivity
list.description: Extracts activity sessions data from the provided object.

list.title: extractAverageSessions
list.description: Extracts and transforms activity sessions data into an array of objects containing day names and session lengths.

list.title: extractMainData
list.description: Extracts and formats the main data for the application from the provided object.

list.title: extractPerformance
list.description: Extracts and formats the performance data for the application from the provided object.

list.title: render
list.description: Renders the application to the DOM.

list.title: useAuth
list.description: Hook that provides authentication information for the application.

list.title: useD3
list.description: Hook that provides a reference to a D3 chart.

list.title: useDimensions
list.description: Hook that provides the dimensions of the parent container.

list.title: useFetchData
list.description: Hook that fetches data from the API.

list.title: useIsMobile
list.description: Hook that detects whether the viewport is mobile or not.
